custom-sql.sql:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY researchobjectid ORDER BY researchobjectversion DESC) AS pos FROM public.gfbio_researchobject WHERE researchobjectid in( SELECT gfbio_project_researchobject.researchobjectid FROM public.gfbio_project_researchobject WHERE gfbio_project_researchobject.projectid = ?) )AS iq
WHERE pos=1

SELECT gfbio_project_researchobject.projectid FROM public.gfbio_project_researchobject WHERE gfbio_project_researchobject.researchobjectid = ? and gfbio_project_researchobject.researchobjectversion = ?
